introCard.question: Can you imagine living in a world without water? How would you perform activities like cooking, washing dishes, and cleaning yourself?
introCard.statement: Faced with the context of water scarcity, Wayru arrived to redefine water use, providing sustainability, well-being, and hygiene in every home.

phrases.phrase1: 1 in 3 people worldwide lack access to safe drinking water.
phrases.phrase2: 3 million Peruvians are affected by this situation.

informativeVideo.title: Our Purpose
informativeVideo.description: We are a social enterprise committed to improving the quality of life for communities without access to potable water networks and facing water scarcity. We seek to:
informativeVideo.tab1_content: Positively impact society through social projects, educational workshops, and innovative solutions.
informativeVideo.tab2_content: Contribute to sustainable development, promoting responsible water management and the conservation of our natural resources.
informativeVideo.tab3_content: Empower more families to be part of the change our planet needs, through sustainable water disposal and consumption practices.
informativeVideo.tab4_content: Inspire more actors to join our cause and act against water scarcity.

productSection.title: Our Innovative Product
productSection.item1_description: Cutting-edge technology that extracts pure drinking water directly from the air, providing a sustainable solution for arid regions.
productSection.item2_description: Advanced filtration systems ensuring safe and clean water, adaptable for homes, communities, and emergency situations.
productSection.item3_description: Easy-to-use kits and educational materials to help households reduce water consumption and adopt water-saving habits.

eventsSection.title: Community & Events
eventsSection.event1_description: Join our educational workshop on sustainable water practices and community involvement. Learn how you can make a difference.
eventsSection.event2_description: Participate in our annual charity run to raise funds for water projects in underserved communities. Every step counts!
eventsSection.event3_description: Discover the latest advancements in water technology and policy at our annual summit. Connect with experts and leaders.

newsSection.mainSubtitle: Wayru, the project aiming to make Lima more accessible to drinking water

impactSection.title: Want to know how Wayru is transforming the world?
impactSection.description: Learn more about our impact on communities, the environment, and society.

serParte.title: Be Part of the Change
serParte.introText: Your contribution can make a significant difference. Explore how you can get involved and help us bring clean water to more communities.
serParte.slide1_description: Companies and individuals can fund specific projects to bring water and environmental education to more communities. Let's build together!
serParte.slide2_description: Share your knowledge or connect us with communities that could benefit from our projects. Be part of the positive impact!
serParte.slide3_description: Follow us on social media and share our work with those around you. Help us spread the message of sustainability!

form.description: Fill out the form below and we'll get in touch with you shortly.
form.name: Name
form.submitted: Thank you! Your message has been sent.

social.title: Spread the Word
social.description: Follow us and share our mission on your social networks.

alliesSection.title: Together We Make a Difference
alliesSection.description: Meet our partners who share our vision and join us in our commitment to create a more sustainable world.

homeContactSection.title: Let's build a sustainable future
homeContactSection.subtitle: CONTACT US!
homeContactSection.imageAlt: People from the community benefiting from water projects

ourMission.title: Our Mission
ourMission.missionText: Transform the way we use water to ensure a more sustainable and healthy world for everyone, especially for communities with water scarcity, through innovation, education, and collaboration.
ourMission.visionText: Ensure that water is a valued resource used sustainably, achieving a healthy planet and a better quality of life today and for future generations.

solutions.subtitle: Discover how we transform the world, one drop at a time
solutions.impactWaterSavedLabel: Liters of water saved annually per family
solutions.impactWaterDaysLabel: Days of water in the home
solutions.impactPeopleEmpoweredLabel: People empowered as agents of change
solutions.testimonialsDescription: Hear from those who have experienced our impact firsthand and see the projects that make a difference.
solutions.testimonial1Quote: Wayru's project brought clean water to our village, changing our lives forever. We are healthier and more hopeful.
solutions.testimonial2Quote: The new irrigation system has boosted our crops and income. Thank you, Wayru!
solutions.testimonial3Quote: Learning about water conservation has empowered us to make sustainable choices for our families.
solutions.odsDescription: Discover how we contribute to the Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs) and contribute to positive change in communities that need access to water and better living conditions.
solutions.odsCard3Description: We contribute to well-being by improving personal hygiene and reducing the risk of diseases related to lack of access to drinking water and adequate hygiene.
solutions.odsCard6Description: We improve access to safe water, adequate hygiene, and efficient water use, benefiting the environment and society.
solutions.odsCard10Description: We provide access to basic resources like water, hygiene, and sustainability knowledge to disadvantaged communities, improving their quality of life.
solutions.odsCard11Description: We promote sustainable management of water resources, helping people live in healthier communities.
solutions.odsCard13Description: We collaborate with the conservation of natural resources and provide tools for people to live in communities more resilient to climate change.

projects.ally12: Young Leaders of the Americas Initiative

complaintsBook.title: Complaints Book
complaintsBook.introText1: In accordance with the provisions of the Consumer Protection and Defense Code, we have a virtual Complaints Book at your disposal.
complaintsBook.section1Title: 1. Identification of the consumer or claimant
complaintsBook.relatedToLabel: The claim or complaint is related to a (select one or both)*

claimTypes.claim: Claim: Dissatisfaction related to products or services
claimTypes.complaint: Complaint: Dissatisfaction not related to products or services; or, discomfort or discontent regarding customer service

complaintsBook.claimDetailLabel: Detail or reason for the claim*
complaintsBook.claimDetailPlaceholder: Describe your claim or complaint here...
complaintsBook.signatureHelpText: Optional. Attach a file if necessary. (File upload requires server configuration).
complaintsBook.postNextText1: It is important that you complete all data marked as "mandatory" in this claim/complaint form so that it can be properly evaluated and addressed.
complaintsBook.postNextText2: Once the form is submitted, you will receive the claim sheet and an identification code via the email you provided.
complaintsBook.postNextText3: It is important to note that there is a time limit of 30 calendar days to address your claim or complaint. However, in special cases, this maximum period may be extended, and the user will be notified through the contact method indicated in the form.
complaintsBook.postNextText4: By submitting this claim or complaint form, you confirm that you have been informed about the procedure, the response time, and the means of response.
complaintsBook.submissionSuccessMessage: Your {claimType} with case number {caseNumber} has been registered. You will receive a copy in your email. (In a real application, a copy would also be sent to contacto@wayruperu.com).
complaintsBook.selectAtLeastOneError: Select at least one option (Product or Service).
